argument.name: Active_Session_Count
argument.description: The number of active Application Server sessions at the time of the function call.

page.discussion: Obsolete This method is obsolete and has been removed from the software as of Version 11. The A5_COUNT_WEBSESSIONS() function returns the number of active Application Server sessions at the time of the function call.. Deprecated in Alpha Five Version 10

section.description: This approach allows you to read the values that are set.
section.example: dim nSessions as N nSessions = a5_count_websessions() ? nSessions = 15
